content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 25.0)
Consists of boiler (position -11.5, 25.0), steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5).
- The boiler is currently full and is connected to the offshore pump for water supply.
- The steam engine is not connected to the power network.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0).

### Copper plate factory at position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5).
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position 5, 5 to the assembling machine at position z1.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the offshore pump is placed correctly to connect to the boiler. Check for any obstacles or incorrect positioning that may prevent the connection.
- Verify that the boiler is properly positioned to connect to the steam engine. Placement issues can arise if the entities are too far apart or obstructed.

### Errors related to power supply
- The lab is not receiving power. Make sure that all power connections are properly established and that there are no breaks in the power network.
- Check the status of the electricity generator and ensure it is connected to the power network to avoid power supply issues.

### General placement errors
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for occupied tiles or incorrect positioning that may lead to placement failures.
